data.name: Guardians Of Gaia
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

  • Prepare for battle!

Guardians of Gaia is a team-based PvP Arena Brawler. Control the battleground using intuitive third person melee combat.

Choose from a cast of powerful Guardians, work as a team and dominate the arena.
Launching with "Gaia Wars", face off in 4-on-4 team battles. Conquer Crystals, gain territory and battle towards the destruction of the oppositions Gaia Cores.


  • Choose your Guardian!

Choose from a diverse set of characters with unique abilities. Exchange your spoils from battle to unlock new skills and master new weapons.


  • Advance your combat!

Discover different weapon styles, character traits and the use of Gaia elements. Switch weapons mid-game to alter the course of the battle.


  • Explore the Arena!

Explore how to use the environment to gain tactical advantage. Each Arena features multiple routes, choke points and unlockable shortcuts. Use team work and mobility to control the arena.

Become Guardian. Become Gaia.

data.short_description: Guardians of Gaia is a team-based PvP Arena Brawler. Control the battleground using intuitive third person melee combat. Choose from a cast of powerful Guardians and join exhilarating battles.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, German, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, French, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 3 GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 560 4 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel™ Core i7-3770 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 590
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 MB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:
